description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ghost-type moves.

name: draco-plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.

name: dread-plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dark-type moves.

name: iron-plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Steel-type moves.

name: odd-incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.

name: rock-incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

name: full-incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that makes the holder bloated and slow moving.

name: wave-incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

name: rose-incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

name: pure-incense

name: protector

name: electirizer
description: A box packed with a tremendous amount of electric energy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: magmarizer
description: A box packed with a tremendous amount of magma energy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: dubious-disc
description: A transparent device overflowing with dubious data. Its producer is unknown.

name: reaper-cloth
description: A cloth imbued with horrifyingly strong spiritual energy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

name: razor-claw

name: razor-fang
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It may cause the foe to flinch when the holder inflicts damage.

name: tm01
description: Powerful, but makes the user flinch if hit by the foe.

name: tm02
description: Hooks and slashes the foe with long, sharp claws.

name: tm03
description: Generates an ultrasonic wave that may confuse.

name: tm04
description: Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF by focusing the mind.

name: tm05
description: A savage roar that makes the foe flee  to end the battle.

name: tm06
description: Poisons the foe with a toxin that gradually worsens.

name: tm07
description: Summons a hailstorm that hurts all types except ICE.

name: tm08
description: Bulks up the body to boost both ATTACK & DEFENSE.

name: tm09
description: Shoots 2 to 5 seeds in a row to strike the foe.

name: tm10
description: The attack power varies among different POKéMON.

name: tm11
description: Raises the power of FIRE-type moves for 5 turns.

name: tm12
description: Enrages the foe so it can only use attack moves.

name: tm13
description: Fires an icy cold beam that may freeze the foe.

name: tm14
description: A vicious snow-and- wind attack that may freeze the foe.

name: tm15
description: Powerful, but needs recharging the next turn.

name: tm16
description: Creates a wall of light that lowers SP. ATK damage.

name: tm17
description: Negates all damage, but may fail if used in succession.

name: tm18
description: Raises the power of WATER-type moves for 5 turns.

name: tm19
description: Recovers half the HP of the damage  this move inflicts.

name: tm20
description: Prevents status abnormality with a mystical power.

name: tm21
description: The less the user likes you, the more powerful this move.

name: tm22
description: Absorbs sunlight in the 1st turn, then attacks next turn.

name: tm23
description: Slams the foe with a hard tail. It may lower DEFENSE.

name: tm24
description: A powerful electric attack that may cause paralysis.

name: tm25
description: Strikes the foe with a thunderbolt. It may paralyze.

name: tm26
description: Causes a quake that has no effect on flying foes.

name: tm27
description: The more the user likes you, the more powerful this move.

name: tm28
description: Digs underground the 1st turn, then strikes next turn.

name: tm29
description: A powerful psychic attack that may lower SP. DEF.

name: tm30
description: Hurls a dark lump at the foe. It may lower SP. DEF.

name: tm31

name: tm32
description: Creates illusory copies to enhance elusiveness.

name: tm33
description: Creates a wall of light that weakens physical attacks.

name: tm34
description: Zaps the foe with a jolt of electricity that never misses.

name: tm35
description: Looses a stream of fire that may burn the foe.

name: tm36
description: Hurls sludge at the foe. It may poison the foe.

name: tm37
description: Causes a sandstorm that hits the foe over several turns.

name: tm38
description: A powerful fire attack that may burn the foe.

name: tm39

name: tm40
description: An extremely fast attack that can’t be avoided.

name: tm41
description: Prevents the foe from using the same move in a row.

name: tm42
description: Raises ATTACK when poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

name: tm43
description: Adds an effect to attack depending on the location.

name: tm44
description: The user sleeps for 2 turns to restore health and status.

name: tm45
description: Makes it tough to attack a foe of the opposite gender.

name: tm46
description: While attacking, it may steal the foe’s held item.

name: tm47
description: Spreads hard-edged wings and slams into the foe.

name: tm48
description: Switches abilities with the foe on the turn this is used.

name: tm49
description: Steals the effects of the move the foe is trying to use.

name: tm50
description: Enables full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK.

name: tm51

name: tm52

name: tm53

name: tm55

name: tm57

name: tm58

name: tm59

name: tm60

name: tm61
description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish white flame at the foe to inflict a burn.

name: tm62

name: tm63

name: tm64
description: The user explodes to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.

name: tm65

name: tm66

name: tm67

name: tm68

name: tm69
description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It sharply raises the Speed stat.

name: tm70
description: The user flashes a light that cuts the foe’s accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.

name: tm71

name: tm72
description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.

name: tm73
description: A weak electric charge is launched at the foe. It causes paralysis if it hits.

name: tm74
description: The user tackles the foe from a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

name: tm75
description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.

name: tm76
description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.

name: tm77

name: tm78
description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

name: tm79
description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

name: tm80
description: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also make the target flinch.

name: tm81

name: tm82

name: tm84

name: tm85

name: tm86

name: tm87
description: The user enrages the foe into confusion. However, it also sharply raises the foe’s Attack stat.

name: tm88

name: tm89
description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: tm90

name: tm91

name: tm92

name: hm01
description: Attacks the foe with sharp blades or claws.

name: hm02
description: Flies up on the first turn, then attacks next turn.

name: hm03
description: Creates a huge wave, then crashes it down on the foe.

name: hm04
description: Builds enormous power, then slams the foe.

name: hm05
description: Looses a powerful blast of light that reduces accuracy.

name: hm06
description: A rock-crushingly tough attack that may lower DEFENSE.

name: hm07
description: Attacks the foe with enough power to climb waterfalls.

name: hm08
description: Dives underwater the 1st turn, then attacks next turn.

description: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.

description: A machine to separate Necrozma, which needed light, from Lunala.

name: left-poke-ball

name: roto-hatch
description: One of the Rotom Powers. It helps Eggs hatch faster.

name: roto-bargain
description: One of the Rotom Powers. It reduces the prices of products at Poké Marts by half.

name: roto-prize-money
description: One of the Rotom Powers. It triples the prize money you receive after battle.

name: roto-exp-points
description: One of the Rotom Powers. It increases the Exp. Points your Pokémon receive after battle a little.

name: roto-friendship
description: One of the Rotom Powers. It helps Pokémon in your party grow friendly faster.

name: roto-encounter
description: One of the Rotom Powers. It increases the chance of encountering high-level wild Pokémon a lot for a certain period of time.

name: roto-stealth
description: One of the Rotom Powers. It prevents you from encountering wild Pokémon for a certain period of time.

name: roto-hp-restore
description: One of the Rotom Powers. It fully restores the HP of your battling Pokémon.

name: roto-pp-restore
description: One of the Rotom Powers. It fully restores the PP of your battling Pokémon.

name: roto-boost
description: One of the Rotom Powers. It raises all stats of your battling Pokémon.

name: roto-catch
description: One of the Rotom Powers. It increases the chance to catch Pokémon a lot.

name: autograph
description: The autograph you got from the Vermilion City Gym Leader, Lt. Surge. He wrote, “Good luck!”

name: clothing-trunk
description: A very light trunk that can carry clothing for you and your Pokémon.

name: silver-razz-berry
description: A Berry that makes it easier to catch Pokémon when given to them.

name: golden-razz-berry
description: A Berry that makes it drastically easier to catch Pokémon when given to them.

name: silver-nanab-berry
description: A Berry that calms wild Pokémon you’re trying to catch when given to them.

name: golden-nanab-berry
description: A Berry that calms wild Pokémon you’re trying to catch drastically when given to them.

name: silver-pinap-berry
description: A Berry that makes you more likely to get an item when given to Pokémon you’re trying to catch.

name: golden-pinap-berry
description: A Berry that makes you drastically more likely to get an item when given to Pokémon you’re trying to catch.

name: stretchy-spring

name: chalky-stone

name: marble

name: lone-earring

name: beach-glass
